message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn for a slightly better share. This is still a good deal for you, Alice!
Come on Bob, meet me in the middle!
The clock is ticking, Alice!  Let's split the difference from your last offer and call it a deal.
Getting closer, but I still want a bit more
Alice, this is incredibly generous! I'm taking a small hit to get this done.  Don't let this opportunity slip away.
